results.name: Number of iterations of map x -> 1+(x-(largest divisor d < x)), starting from x=n, needed to reach a fixed point, which is always either a prime or 1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20669
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 1..65537
mathematica: {0}~Join~Array[-2 + Length@ NestWhileList[1 + (# - Divisors[#][[-2]]) &, #, UnsameQ, All] &, 104, 2] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jan 04 2019 *)
xref: Cf. A060681, A064918, A323075 (the fixed points reached), A323077, A323079.
